title: Super Tuesday Review, Sanders’ Strategy Moving Forward, and Saying Goodbye to Chris Matthews
description:
*Disclaimer*: This episode was taped on Wednesday, March 4, before Elizabeth Warren suspended her campaign
Matt and Katie discuss the results of Super Tuesday, say goodbye to Pete, Klobuchar, Bloomberg and Chris Matthews, and how Bernie needs to change his strategy.

*Merch Link*: https://teespring.com/stores/useful-idiots
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
